segments.text: I'm sorry , sir . I'm going to have to ask you to leave .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? I was just having a friendly conversation with the lady here ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , she apparently doesn't think it's so friendly . Let's go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think there's been a misunderstanding !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'd better cooperate with me , sir , or ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK ! Just give her this for me !
segments.speaker: S2
